abstract: The Federal Communications Commission tells Cablevision and News Corporation that they have an obligation to negotiate in “good faith.”
snippet: The Federal Communications Commission tells Cablevision and News Corporation that they have an obligation to negotiate in “good faith.”
lead_paragraph: 4:15 p.m. | Updated The Federal Communications Commission on Friday stepped up its pressure on Cablevision and News Corporation, signaling just how seriously the feud over retransmission payments is being taken in Washington.

headline.main: F.C.C. Calls for ‘Good Faith’ in Cable Dispute

byline.original: By Brian Stelter and Bill Carter
